question: Sunanda Patnaik, who passed away recently, was a veteran personality in which field?
explanation:
The 85-year old Veteran Indian classical singer Sunanda Patnaik recently passed away. The singer was referred to as ‘Guruma’ by the professionals in the Odia music field, in reverence. Known for her melodious voice, she began her musical career with the All India Radio while she was 14 years old. His father was the famous poet of the state- Baikunthanath Patnaik.
Born in Odisha, the famous singer later moved to Kolkata in 1983 and launched a music institute named ‘Vishnu Vinayak Sangeet Ashram’.
